item.title: about
item.description:
University professor tinkering with electronics, particularly Arduino.

  • Github
  • Old wordpress site

The source for this site is at GitHub.

item.title: New website
item.description:
I’m working on a new project (a low-cost CO2 monitor), which inspired me to create a new website.

My old website is now pretty old (last post 2014-01-14), and I just don’t want to touch Wordpress anymore.

But I feel inspired to get back into it, so why not start fresh?
